016package org.gbif.api.service.collections;
017
018import org.gbif.api.model.collections.CollectionEntity;
019import org.gbif.api.model.collections.suggestions.ChangeSuggestion;
020import org.gbif.api.model.collections.suggestions.Status;
021import org.gbif.api.model.collections.suggestions.Type;
022import org.gbif.api.model.common.paging.Pageable;
023import org.gbif.api.model.common.paging.PagingResponse;
024
025import java.util.UUID;
026
027import jakarta.annotation.Nullable;
028import jakarta.validation.Valid;
029
030/** Defines the service to suggest changes in GRSciColl entities. */
031public interface ChangeSuggestionService<
032    T extends CollectionEntity, R extends ChangeSuggestion<T>> {
033
034  int createChangeSuggestion(@Valid R changeSuggestion);
035
036  void updateChangeSuggestion(@Valid R changeSuggestion);
037
038  void discardChangeSuggestion(int key);
039
040  // returns the entity created if applies
041  UUID applyChangeSuggestion(int key);
042
043  R getChangeSuggestion(int key);
044
045  PagingResponse<R> list(
046      @Nullable Status status,
047      @Nullable Type type,
048      @Nullable String proposedBy,
049      @Nullable UUID entityKey,
050      @Nullable String ihIdentifier,
051      @Nullable String country,
052      @Nullable Pageable page);
053}
